about_the_game:
In this exciting and immersive game, players take on the role of a budding monster trainer as they explore a vast and fantastical world filled with all sorts of strange and wonderful creatures. With their trusty Montams in the team, players must journey across fields, forests, and caves in search of rare and powerful monsters to capture and train.

As players progress through the game, they will encounter an array of colorful and unique monsters, each with their own distinct abilities and personalities. Players must use strategy and skill to capture these monsters, and then use their training techniques to battle against rival trainers and emerge victorious.

In this game, players can choose between three different battle systems: a classic turn-based system, a grid-based turn-based system or an active-battle system. All three systems offer unique challenges and gameplay experiences, allowing players to choose the style of battle that best suits their preferences and tactics.

In addition to the main game, every purchase of MonTamer also includes the MonTamer editor, a powerful tool that allows you to create your own monster-catching game without any programming experience. The editor includes event, mon, quest, item, ability, and dialog editors, as well as many other features that will help you bring your vision to life.

To use the MonTamer editor, you will need to have the Unity game engine installed on your computer. Unity3D is a widely-used game engine that is available for free download, and it provides a powerful set of tools and resources that can be used to build games of all types. With the MonTamer editor and Unity3D, you'll have everything you need to create a unique and engaging monster-catching game that will keep players coming back for more.

Keep up with the latest developments in MonTamer by subscribing to our YouTube channel and joining our Discord server. We regularly post DevLogs to show you how the game is coming along and give you a behind-the-scenes look at the development process. Don't miss out on all the fun - start your journey as a MonTamer with us!

name: MonTamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Celeron G530 2.4Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650M or similar
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100T 3.2Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or similar

short_description: MonTamer is an immersive game that lets you catch and train a wide variety of different monsters as you explore a vast and exciting world. From completing quests and solving puzzles to facing off against other skilled MonTamers, there's always something new and exciting to do in MonTamer.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
